mods.note: mmaF CONFIDE NTUL Wo.148-S II lA^ PERSIAN GULF RESIDENCY BAHRAIN> the 16th January, 1948 The Political Agent, BAHRAIN The Political Agent, The Political Agent, MUSCAT y MEMORANDUM His Majesty's Government have instructed the High Commissioners in India and Pakistan to send this Residency summarised monthly appreciations of the general situation in India and Pakistan, dealing primarily with political developments but also including some account of important events in other fields, of economic conditions and of the state of public opinion. The distribution of these summaries will begin from January 1st 1948 and a copy will be supplied to you in future by this Residency, For Secretary to the 'LB' Political Resident, Persian Gulf,

mods.abstract: This file consists of a copy of a letter that was sent from the Persian Gulf Residency in Bahrain to the Political Agencies in Bahrain, Kuwait and Muscat. The letter explains that the High Commissioners in India and Pakistan had recently been directed to provide monthly intelligence summaries to the Persian Gulf Residency and that the distribution of these summaries would commence in January 1948.
